step.title: Which into the mountain
step.description: After an exhausting encounter with a bugbear, four travelling heroes are grateful to find a small town nestled in the unfamiliar hills. Their relief quickly turns to suspicion, however, when they find the town of Angurkslariun uninhabited—at least by the living.

step.title: Who am I?
step.description: I will be yesterday, I was tomorrow.

step.title: Seeking shelter in Angurkslariun
step.description: So you chose to go to the city of Angurkslariun. The town is little more than ten or twelve buildings scattered on either side of the weedy road. You can see a graveyard, then an abandoned camp, then finally a cave. BUT, WAIT! What is that? Wraiths, possessed animals and beasts they begin to emerge from the dark places of cite. Then you progress further into the cave, however, you can see more human enemies... Necromancers come in your direction.
